mean_cn: v. 准确地解释或说明；  adj. 精确的；  n. 针尖，极小之物，极不重要的事物
mean_en: to find and show the exact position of somebody/something or the exact time that something happened; to be able to give the exact reason for something or to describe something exactly
sentence: I pinpointed the enemy's position with the flag.
sentence_trans: 我用旗子标明了敌人确切的位置。
